title: Motley Fool Money: 09 02 2011
description: Clark Howard shares financial tips with his latest book Living Large In Lean Times. Motley Fool co-founder & CEO Tom Gardner talks about the legacy of Steve Jobs and offers a few stocks on his radar. Plus, our analysts discuss the latest economic news, DOJ blocking the AT&T/T-Mobile deal, Amazon’s upcoming tablet launch and Starz walking away from Netflix.
content:encoded: Clark Howard shares financial tips with his latest book Living Large In Lean Times.
